name: JFR - Connecticut - Super Toro
additionalNotes:
JFR stands for "Just For Retailers," and it is manufactured by Tabacalera Tropical. This is an exclusive brand that is made explicitly for retailers.The cigars come in boxes of 50 and are available in three wrapper shades: Connecticut, Corojo, and Maduro, all exclusive to the JFR brand and grown from 
These smokes are very well constructed; the wrapper folds into the foot, allowing for extra durability and an easy ligth. All sizes (excluding the Pyramide) are rolled in the traditional Cuban pigtail style, where the excess wrapper is twisted up at the tip of the cap. These cigars carry some surprisingly complex tasting notes, considering their price; reviewers have identified floral notes as well as coffee, pepper, cocoa, clove, and many others.
